hero.title: About AFRILingua DAO
hero.subtitle: Preserving and empowering African languages for future generations

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AFRILingua DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization dedicated to preserving, revitalizing, and empowering African languages through innovative blockchain technology and community-driven governance.
mission.statement: To ensure that every African language thrives in the digital age, connecting communities and preserving cultural heritage for generations to come.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where African languages are fully digitized, accessible, and thriving on the global stage.

pillar1.title: Digital Preservation
pillar1.description: Create comprehensive digital archives of African languages, including written texts, audio recordings, and cultural contexts.

pillar2.title: Global Accessibility
pillar2.description: Make African languages accessible to learners worldwide through technology and educational resources.

stat1.title: Language Endangerment
stat1.description: Over 2,000 African languages face extinction, with many having no digital presence.

stat2.title: Cultural Loss
stat2.description: With each language lost, we lose unique cultural knowledge, traditions, and worldviews.

stat3.title: Limited Resources
stat3.description: Lack of funding, documentation, and technological infrastructure hinders language preservation efforts.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: AFRILingua DAO leverages blockchain technology and decentralized governance to create a sustainable, community-driven platform for African language preservation and promotion.

feature1.title: Decentralized Governance
feature1.description: Community members make decisions through transparent, democratic processes using blockchain-based voting.

feature2.title: Digital Infrastructure
feature2.description: Build comprehensive digital libraries, translation tools, and learning platforms for African languages.

feature3.title: Community Engagement
feature3.description: Empower native speakers, linguists, and enthusiasts to contribute content, validate translations, and spread awareness.

feature4.title: Sustainable Funding
feature4.description: Utilize blockchain-based funding mechanisms to ensure long-term sustainability and fair compensation for contributors.

value1.title: Cultural Preservation
value1.description: We believe every language is a priceless cultural treasure that must be protected and celebrated.

value2.title: Inclusivity
value2.description: We welcome all African languages, dialects, and linguistic communities with equal respect and support.

value3.title: Innovation
value3.description: We embrace cutting-edge technology to solve traditional challenges in language preservation.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.description: Be part of the revolution that's preserving African languages for future generations.

future.title: Long-Term Vision
future.description: Our journey doesn't end here. We envision a world where every African language thrives digitally.

goal1.title: Universal Access
goal1.description: Make all African languages accessible to anyone, anywhere in the world.

goal2.title: Cultural Heritage
goal2.description: Create the most comprehensive digital archive of African linguistic heritage ever assembled.

goal3.title: Next Generation
goal3.description: Empower future generations to connect with their roots through technology.
